author: Madhav Sharma
comment: Awesome App, please change the design to something more user friendly and more pleasing to the eyes, also please add reminders. Otherwise GOOD JOB!!!

author: becrazy Wigen
comment: Just started to use it.  I like it but I would love to beable to change the order of the 'Lists' also instead of just the items in the list.

reply.author: BinaryEarth
reply.content: Thanks for the suggestion. Currently the lists themselves are just shown alphabetically.

author: Farkas Gabor
comment: It's not compatible with rounded screen. I almost can't see anything that I'm writing with this app.

reply.author: BinaryEarth
reply.content: Round watches are not ideal for lists, but I have tested it on two round Moto 360's (1st gen, and Sports) and it works ok on both. My contact details are at www.binaryearth.net

author: Mark Young
comment: Great for creating and managing check lists such as todo or shopping lists right there on your watch!  Could use faster input method like voice support -- but please always provide the on-watch keyboard as an option because voice sometimes can't be used.  Could use integration and sync with corresponding Adroid version.  Glad I do NOT have to push my data to the cloud to use it.  Over all, though, I think this is extremely useful and works great even just as it is -- and prefer it to any other similar app!
title: Best check list app for Android Wear

author: Rowan Allard
comment: You are a model developer! You take on board all feedback and act on it quickly and effectively! Both of my concerns were dealt with and the app is now much better than before. I also tried out the alternate theme and prefer it to the default one. Take my 5 stars with thanks.

reply.author: BinaryEarth
reply.content: Thanks! These sort of user suggestions are what make apps great. Version 3.5 has new options on the watch to keep the screen on and to move ticked items to the bottom. There's also a couple of other new options including an alternate white-on-black theme and the option to strike-thru ticked items.

author: Karundeep Yadav
comment: Thanks for this wonderful app.. Can you make the size of letters a bit small as it need a lot of scrolling just to type a single word.. Or Add just make use of google's speak now feature so that will make file a bit easier..

reply.author: BinaryEarth
reply.content: Thanks for suggestions. Keyboard layout has been improved in version 4.0. But speech will only work if you have a data connection via your phone, and this app is intended to work stand-alone without a phone present.

author: K OC
comment: Just what I was looking for for android wear.  It operates great on android wear with out wifi or connection to my phone.
title: Great for android wear

author: Karen Wood
comment: Very useful, I use it all the time to keep track of what I need to remember.
title: Great app!
